item.description:
Anytime is a good time to start embracing a healthy lifestyle. Plus Size Yoga Meetup is a 2-hour yoga workshop is aimed at offering full figured women a judgment free space to embrace and support each other in a healthy lifestyle. It is more than a yoga class.

Learn to use yoga and yogic principles to guide you to a vibrant life full of energy, freedom, and peace. This is a friendly, welcoming, and safe environment to explore yoga, nutrition, and topics that are specific to the lives and concerns of full figured women and women in general.

Join us to recharge and refocus so that you can have the vitality and joyful life you wantâ€”starting here and now. Class taught by Annika Nilsson Ripps, RYT.

Cost: $15 for Plus Size Yoga Meetup Members! $18 for non-members. Thank you in advance for pre-paying through Paypal or Amazon Payments when you RSVP Yes.

group.name: Plus Size Yoga Meetup for Women

item.name: Plus Size Yoga for Women (May Meetup)
